General.Name: SunCar Technology Group Inc.
General.Description: SunCar Technology Group Inc., through its subsidiaries, operates as a cloud-based provider of digitalized enterprise auto services and auto e-Insurance service in the People's Republic of China. It offers one-stop, fully digitalized, and on-demand automotive service systems. The company provides customized service solutions to banks, insurance companies, telecommunication companies, and others. It also provides car wash, oil change, tire repair, car beautification, road assistance, flight pickup, designated driving, VIP lounge, etc. in collaboration with third-party auto service providers. In addition, it facilitates the sale of auto e-Insurance products underwritten by insurance companies through a network of external sales partners. Further, the company provides its services through an online software, as well as offers technical services. The company was established in 2007 and is based in Shanghai, China.
